snippet: JPMorgan Chase said its board intended to elect two new directors: Linda B. Bammann, who was deputy head of risk management at JPMorgan until her retirement in 2005, and Michael A. Neal, former chairman and chief executive of GE Capital.
abstract: JPMorgan Chase said its board intended to elect two new directors: Linda B. Bammann, who was deputy head of risk management at JPMorgan until her retirement in 2005, and Michael A. Neal, former chairman and chief executive of GE Capital.

headline.main: JPMorgan Chase Picks 2 for Board Seats
